mapper.insert: INSERT INTO repository_file (file_id, writing_id, file_name, save_file_name, file_path, file_size, file_extension, creation_date) VALUES ( repository_file_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writingId}, #{fileName}, #{saveFileName}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize}, #{fileExtension}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT file_id, writing_id, file_name, save_file_name, file_path, creation_date, file_size, file_extension FROM repository_file WHERE writing_id = #{writingId}
